idea: Trapeza is a neobanking platform striving to provide a solution to the under-served class. Trapeza aims to achieve this using interactive technology and existing networks to strike the right balance for the user.
name: Trapeza Technologies Private limited

idea: RUMAJI INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED began with the mission to ensure that the small-landholding farmers of India are given fair compensation for their produce and labour. This was to be achieved while ensuring that we adhere to global standards of agricultural practices, world-class infrastructure, international food safety standards, and the will to deliver safe, hygienic, and healthy food to our consumers.
name: RUMAJI INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: GANESH SABLE EDUCATION (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED , Apna Class is a platform that helps students to expand and enhance the learning process beyond the classroom experience. Apna class is a platform that provides the students with immense knowledge of each and every subject. The App provides study materials, self assessments which will make the students understand the subject better and also bring out the curiosity, innovation and interest in them. As every student is different with different needs we have focused on each and every aspect to make the students to grasp the subject better.
name: GANESH SABLE EDUCATION (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The company will be Investment Manager for Category III AIF. The AIF is a multi-asset strategy investment fund which seeks to generate absolute returns with lower volatility, leading to a superior risk- adjusted return ratio agnostic to economic cycles and investment environments.
name: PARADIGMARQ ADVISORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are manufacturing Moulded Products with insulation properties. Mainly with enclosures and boxes with different technical specifications. Application is in all field. Marine air, petrochemical different chemical plants.
name: CHANDAN ELECTROTECH PVT LTD

idea: To facilitate in India or elsewhere, global transaction/corporate banking with all possible financial tools to cater to needs of global corporates as well as facilitate learning of “ Concepts of Risk management and Banking” across age groups, to develop a product with multi verticals, targeted at the global corporates for all their corporate finance requirements as well as a platform for buying and selling goods and services across and within geographies and also developing a product in the gaming segment to facilitate learning in the area of Risk management and under the category of “Skill based gaming” and facilitate a product for banking activities through a scientific approach in a professional, distinct, prompt, personalised and result oriented way by providing all banking related services being offered under one single roof and also to act as advisors in the fields of debt structuring and credit, Reporting- current and capital account transactions, M&A Advisory, Escrow Advisory and all other banking services under in-sourcing model such as Export Operations, Import Operations, Vendor BG’s Management , Issuance of LC’s ,Issuance of Customer BG’s, Guidance on IDPMS/EDPMS activities and any other RBI/FEMA related queries and also involving in all other financial, costing, accounting internal control and other similar matters to advise and assist in the preparation of all revenue and capital budgets, developments of funds, long term planning or utilisation of resources, procuring bank and institutional finance including cash, credit facilities, overdraft facilities, subscription of debentures and term loans, to assess the needs of short and long term credit facilities and raising of resources, to advise financial and cost accounting procedure and other connected matters to advise and assist in formulating long term financial policies and control of their execution, and generally to advise and assist in all financial, fiscal and revenue matters.
name: UNOROOF FINTECH SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To bring the built and digital environments together. A decentralized tech platform around  Property market in India
name: ASAHI LANDTECH INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Kravish pharmaceuticals ltd is built with the purpose and core belief of knowledge, passion & innovation. Kravish means knowledge, leadership, fairness. To be a most admired Indian pharma company for its innovative, superior quality,and accessibility of products.
name: KRAVISH PHARMACEUTICAL PRIVATE LIMITED
